thread.title: BRIEF-AIG Files For Potential Fixed-To-Floating Rate Series A-9 Junior Subordinated Debentures Due 2048

title: BRIEF-AIG Files For Potential Fixed-To-Floating Rate Series A-9 Junior Subordinated Debentures Due 2048
text: March 19, 2018 / 1:29 PM / Updated 26 minutes ago BRIEF-AIG Files For Potential Fixed-To-Floating Rate Series A-9 Junior Subordinated Debentures Due 2048 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 19 (Reuters) - American International Group Inc : * AIG FILES FOR POTENTIAL FIXED-TO-FLOATING RATE SERIES A-9 JUNIOR SUBORDINATED DEBENTURES DUE 2048, SIZE NOT DISCLOSED - SEC FILING * AIG SAYS JUNIOR SUBORDINATED DEBENTURES WILL BE SOLD IN DENOMINATIONS OF $2,000 AND INTEGRAL MULTIPLES OF $1,000 IN EXCESS THEREOF Source text: ( bit.ly/2tW2pnu ) Further company coverage:
